name: Quest Eternal
description:
Quest Eternal is a 2D action platformer with a focus on fighting your way through the levels as quickly as possible, while defeating enemies and searching for the source of evil. Sprak is summoned to combat the evil spreading across the world.

Travel through different levels and environments, unlocking new abilities and learning new skills. Go back to previous levels and worlds and try to beat you old score or find and unlock new areas to explore. Figure out what happened last time evil spread across these lands and find out how to make history repeat itself.
